welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunset Hills, the charming city known for its breathtaking sunsets and friendly locals. We invite you to soak in our city's beauty and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport, serving private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
